Banner.title:
We build our future
Brick by Brick!

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.text: We are team #15996, BrickBot, from <cnu>"Unirea" National College, Focșani, Romania</cnu>. Since 2016, we have been competing in <ftc>FIRST Tech Challenge</ftc>. Beyond building robots, we love spreading the STEAM spirit in both the local and FTC communities.

Carousel.FocsaniMeet2025: DIVE Into Innovation League Meet, Jan 2025

Introduction.title: Introduction
Introduction.text: We are team #15996, BrickBot, from <cnu>“Unirea” National College, Focșani, Romania</cnu>. Since 2016, we have taken part in the <ftc>FIRST Tech Challenge</ftc>, working hard to build competitive robots. We are passionate about promoting STEAM education and creating opportunities for learning and growth in both our local community and the wider FTC network.

JoinBrickBot.title: Join Brickbot
JoinBrickBot.text: Passionate about robotics? Fill out the form to show your interest in joining our team.

BrickBotInSchools.title: BrickBot in Schools
BrickBotInSchools.text: Middle school students from local schools explored robotics through our presentations and this year’s game. As part of the BrickBot Caravan, they operated the robot, learned about its design and programming, and discovered the value of teamwork.

InteractingWithThePublic.title: Interacting with the Public
InteractingWithThePublic.text: Engaging with the local community through showcases, humanitarian efforts, and outreach initiatives to inspire a love for robotics and create meaningful impact.

Carousel.MicrometEvent: Exchange Event with our Main Sponsor, Micromet

Sparks1.title: Sparks I (with SIRIUS SOCRATE)
Sparks1.text: An online meeting for new FTC teams from Romania and the Republic of Moldova sharing lessons from challenges and memorable moments in past competitions. Organized in collaboration with SIRIUS, the team we mentor and work closely with.

HowToHelp.title: How to Help
HowToHelp.text: BrickBot operates with the support of sponsors (companies, businesses, individuals). There are three ways to support us:

Redirect.title: Redirect 3.5%
Redirect.text: Romanian citizens can help BrickBot by redirecting 3.5% of income tax through Form 230.

Donate.title: Donate
Donate.text: Anyone can support the BrickBot Association by making a secure donation through Stripe.

Contracts.title: Sponsorship Contracts
Contracts.text: You can support our initiative through financial contributions and/or services. The partnership will be formalized via a contract between your business and our organization.

TheVault.name: The Vault
TheVault.subtitle: Portfolio Library
TheVault.description: An online library of FTC portfolios to help new teams.

Checkpoint.name: Checkpoint
Checkpoint.subtitle: Outreach, Events & Activities
Checkpoint.description: Key outreach events and activities in the local community that highlight impact and involvement.

Sparks.name: Sparks
Sparks.subtitle: Connecting FTC Teams
Sparks.description: Meetings, events, and activities we've done with other FTC teams to stay connected.

BrickDocs.name: BrickDocs
BrickDocs.subtitle: Guide & Documentation
BrickDocs.description: Public documentation we use to train new BrickBot members.

SimplicityFTC.name: SimplicityFTC
SimplicityFTC.subtitle: Open-Source Programming Library
SimplicityFTC.description: Programming library designed to simplify coding for FTC teams.
